name: Causes Gerrit
description: Make Gerrit a little bit nicer to use.
additional_info: IMPORTANT: This sets a lot of fonts to use your browser's default fixed-width font. Tell your browser to use a better fixed-width font, like Inconsolata. In Chrome, go to settings, search for "font", click on "Customize fonts...", change fixed-width font to Inconsolata. --- What does this do? Here's the summary: - Better fixed-width font - Fixed-width font in comment box - Wider comment box - Line highlighting on hover - Better button styles - Shortcut key clues in a bunch of places - Global nav link hover style - Quieter borders --- 2012-11-27: Updated most important things for new version of Gerrit (still work left to do) 2012-11-13: Updated for new version of Gerrit 2012-11-06: Initial release
